scripts.//start: Start and open frontend server. Restart on file change
scripts.//build: Create optimized production build of frontend for deployment
scripts.//lint: Run eslint on directory and subdirectories
scripts.//cypress:open:
Open visual end to end testing tool for development 
    REMEMBER TO:
    Start backend server in test environment and start frontend server
scripts.//test:e2e:
Run all end to end tests in terminal 
    REMEMBER TO:
    Start backend server in test environment and start frontend server
